attributes.action: Do not allow current or ex-PMs to award knighthoods to family members
attributes.additional_details: Boris Johnson is making a mockery of the honours system by putting forward his own father for a knighthood.
attributes.background: Knighthoods, peerages and other awards should not be dished out to people becuase they are family members (or close friends or partners) of the person giving the award - they should be given due to merit, integrity and achievement.

rejection.details:
Honours, including knighthoods, are awarded by the King, not former Prime Ministers.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Reform the Honours System and make it independent of Government: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632600
